instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01598: What is 820-01598? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01598</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no image
threads.message: Got an Macbook Pro with board <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01598</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> with black screen. No signs of water damage. Measured lcd connector J8500 and find <SIGNAL>EDP_AUXCH_N</SIGNAL> short to ground 0ohm. Looks like it goes to <CHIP>U0500</CHIP>. Is it anything to do? Starts fine and all, just no image

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01598</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no image
threads.message:
Check the value disconnecting LCD.
If still short, dead CPU.

Any liquid history?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01598</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no image
threads.message: Just my tought. the measurement are with LCD disconnected. No waterdamage detected. working just fine accept screen.
